DOC.brief_title: Smoking Cessation Substance Abuse Treatment Patients : A Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim study : ( 1 ) examine efficacy self-help material compare self-help material plus prize contingency management ( CM ) smoke abstinence substance abuse treatment patient ( 2 ) examine effect smoke abstinence substance use substance treatment retention . To address specific aim , cigarette smoker enter treatment alcohol , cocaine heroin abuse dependence , report daily smoke ( least one cigarette per day ) past year , meet inclusion exclusion criterion , randomly assign receive self-help material self-help material plus CM . Individuals CM group opportunity win prize , worth average $ 1 , $ 20 , $ 100 , meet smoking abstinence criterion ( CO < 8ppm salivary cotinine < 10ng/mL ) . Participants meet research staff 4 times/week Weeks 1-4 , 2 times/week Weeks 5-8 1 time/week Weeks 9-12 . Follow-up interview schedule 1 , 3 6 month follow smoking quit date .
